heading: Hotfix – September 14, 2023 – Patch 1.1.4
content: . The Dev Team continues to adjust XP gains for players, especially in WT3 and WT4, where the slog is the hardest! To see the nice changes, read below for all the information. If you haven't already, head over to our and select the D4 role in to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
